title: Something in the Rain
resume: Explore the relationship of two people as they go from being “just acquaintances” to “a genuine couple” — Yoon Jin Ah, a coffee shop  supervisor in her 30s, and Seo Joon Hee, a designer at a video game company who has just returned from working abroad.
